document.docAuthor: Marshall, Stephen A., Roháček, Jindřich, Dong, Hui & Buck, Matthias
document.masterDocTitle: The state of Sphaeroceridae (Diptera: Acalyptratae): a world catalog update covering the years 2000 - 2010, with new generic synonymy, new combinations, and new distributions

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The state of Sphaeroceridae (Diptera: Acalyptratae): a world catalog update covering the years 2000 - 2010, with new generic synonymy, new combinations, and new distributions

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Thoracochaeta Duda, 1918
. –
HAYASHI (2005b) : 293
–297 [diagnosis, taxonomy, key to Japanese species, illustr.].

subSubSection.paragraph:
Thoracochaeta accola Roháček & Marshall, 2000
. Distr.: Palaearctic: Cyprus , Georgia , Greece , Ukraine .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Thoracochaeta accola
. –
GATT (2004) : 115
[new record from Cyprus ].

subSubSection.paragraph:
Thoracochaeta brachystoma (Stenhammar, 1855)
. Distr.: Afrotropical: Cameroon , Ghana , Seychelles , South Africa , Yemen ; Australasian / Oceanian: Australia (NSW), Cook Is., Hawaii ( USA ), Micronesia ( Yap Is.), New Caledonia , Palau ( USA ); Nearctic: Canada (NB, NS, PE, QC), USA (CT, FL, MA, NH, NY, RI, TX); Neotropical: Antigua , Argentina , Bahamas , Belize , Bermuda , Chile , Dominica , Easter I., Jamaica , Juan Fernández Is. ( Chile ), Mexico (QNR, YUC), Peru , Turks & Caicos , Venezuela ; Oriental: Indonesia ( Sumatra ), Philippines ; Palaearctic: Algeria , Azores ( Portugal ), Belgium , Bulgaria , Canary Is. ( Spain ), Croatia , Cyprus , Czech Republic , Denmark , Egypt , Finland , France , Georgia, Germany , Great Britain , Greece , Ireland , Israel [record missing from previous catalog], Italy , Japan , Latvia , Lebanon , Madeira ( Portugal ), Malta , Morocco , Netherlands , Norway , Poland , Romania ,? Russia (CET), Spain (incl. Balearic Is.), Sweden , Tunisia , Ukraine , United Arab Emirates ; South Atlantic: Gough I., Tristan da Cunha .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Leptocera brachystoma
. –
PANTELEEVA (2005) : 492
[a doubful record from Russia : CET].

subSubSection.paragraph:
Thoracochaeta erectiseta Carles-Tolrá, 1994
. Distr.: Palaearctic: Canary Is. ( Spain ), Great Britain , Italy ( Sicily ), Morocco , Spain (Balearic Is.).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Thoracochaeta erectiseta
. –
GATT (2007) : 305
[new record from Morocco ].

subSubSection.paragraph:
Thoracochaeta gemina Roháček & Marshall, 2000
. Distr.: Palaearctic: Japan , Russia (FE).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Thoracochaeta gemina
. –
HAYASHI (2005b) : 293
[diagnosis, key, new record from Japan ].

subSubSection.paragraph:
Thoracochaeta mediterranea Munari, 1989
. Distr.: Palaearctic: Croatia , Cyprus , Italy (Pantelleria I.), Malta , Spain (Balearic Is.).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Thoracochaeta mediterranea
. –
ROHÁČEK (2004b) : 259
[new record from Cyprus ].

subSubSection.paragraph:
Thoracochaeta setifer Hayashi, 2005
. Distr.: Palaearctic: Japan .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Thoracochaeta setifer Hayashi, 2005b: 294
[both sexes, key, taxonomic notes, illustr.]. Type locality: Japan , Hokkaido , Nemuro, Nemuro. HT male (NIID).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Thoracochaeta zosterae (Haliday, 1833)
. Distr.: Nearctic: Canada (NB, NS, ON, PE), USA (ME); Neotropical: Argentina ; Palaearctic: Austria , Belgium , Bulgaria , Czech Republic , Denmark , Estonia , Faeroe Is. ( Denmark ), Finland , France , Germany , Great Britain , Greece , Hungary , Iceland , Ireland , Italy , Japan , Latvia , Lebanon , Lithuania , Malta , Netherlands , Norway , Poland , Romania , Russia (NET, FE, SET), Serbia , Slovakia , Sweden , Switzerland , Turkey ; South Atlantic: Gough I.; South Indian Ocean: Île Saint Paul.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Thoracochaeta zosterae
. –
LUTOVINOVAS et al. (2003) : 408
[new record from Lithuania ].
